equity.title: Equity Quiz
equity.description: Test your knowledge of preflop hand equities
equity.question: What's the approximate all-in equity for these two hands?

tips.title: Common Equity Rules
tips.coinflip: Pair vs Two Overcards ≈ 55% vs 45% (classic coinflip)
tips.domination: Dominated hands (e.g., AK vs AQ) ≈ 70% vs 30%
